Forms.Name: End State - Transcript Request Form
Forms.Title: Thank you for your order
Forms.Html: Thank you for your payment. Your order will be processed and you can expect to receive your transcript within 7-10 days. Click here to return to portal

Forms.Html:
Send the transcript to a company. Please fill out the information below to order an official transcript. Prior to ordering an official transcript, please verify that all coursework, grades and degrees are reflected on your record by viewing your unofficial transcript as refunds will not be issued. Please note that there is a $7.00 fee per transcript for official transcripts. Additional taxes and fees may apply in some states.

Official transcripts can be mailed outside of the US only by contacting the Admissions and Records Service Center at (866) 711-1700.

Forms.Name: Transcript Request Form Institution
Forms.Html:
Send the transcript to an institution. Please fill out the information below to order an official transcript. Prior to ordering an official transcript, please verify that all coursework, grades and degrees are reflected on your record by viewing your unofficial transcript as refunds will not be issued. Please note that there is a $7.00 fee per transcript for official transcripts. Additional taxes and fees may apply in some states.

Official transcripts can be mailed outside of the US only by contacting the Admissions and Records Service Center at (866) 711-1700.

Forms.Html:
Send the transcript to me. Please fill out the information below to order an official transcript. Prior to ordering an official transcript, please verify that all coursework, grades and degrees are reflected on your record by viewing your unofficial transcript as refunds will not be issued. Please note that there is a $7.00 fee per transcript for official transcripts. Additional taxes and fees may apply in some states.

Official transcripts can be mailed outside of the US only by contacting the Admissions and Records Service Center at (866) 711-1700.

Forms.Name: Transcript Request Form Payment

To order by phone, call the Office of Admissions and Records Support Center at 1-866-711-1700. Be sure to check your unofficial transcript to make sure your coursework and grades have posted before ordering your official transcript.


You can request an electronic transcript or pay an additional fee for overnight delivery of a paper transcript if you need expedited service. Please note, some limitations apply to overnight deliveries


Please choose from one of the following options:

Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore." } ]"},{"Name":"RadioButtonValue","DisplayName":"Value","Value":"3","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"The Value of the individual radio control in the group. This must be string value which may be a number. If this value is bound, it must be enclosed in double braces. e.g. {{vm.models.myMessage}}. Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore. Values for each control in the group should be different.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Error", "regex": "^(?:[^{].*|{{vm\\.models(?:\\.[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*(?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2})+(?:\\.CustomProperties\\['.+'\\](?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2}|\\.MultiValueCustomProperties\\['.+'\\](?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2}){0,1}}})$", "message": "A radio button Value must be string value. If it is bound it must begin with {{vm.models. and end with }}. Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore. A property array string index requires single quotes. e.g. vm.models.xxx.CustomProperties['yyyyy']." }, { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "cannotStartWithRegex", "validationType": "Warning", "regex": "^vm.models\\..*$", "modifiers": "i", "message": "If Value property is bound, it must start with {{vm.models., and end with }}. Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore." } ]"},{"Name":"Visible","DisplayName":"Visible","Value":"true","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"Makes the control visible or hidden. Can be bound to a workflow argument or another control's value. A property array string index requires single quotes. e.g. vm.models.xxx.CustomProperties['yyyyy']. An expression can be used that evaluates to true or false. e.g. vm.models.myvalue==7 (>,<,!=,==,>=,<=). If comparing to a string, it must be in single quotes. (true and false must be all lowercase)","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Error", "explanation": "true or false or a standard vm.models.", "compileKey": "booleanRule1", "regex": "^(?:true|false|(?:\\(*\\s*.*vm\\.models\\..+\\s*))$", "message": "The Visible property must be "true", "false" or must be a boolean bound value and contain "vm.models." with a unique argument name suffix. Forms.Html:
Official and unofficial transcripts can be requested through our student website or by mail, fax or phone. To order by phone, call the Office of Admissions and Records Support Center at 1-866-711-1700. Be sure to check your unofficial transcript to make sure your coursework and grades have posted before ordering your official transcript.


You can request an electronic transcript or pay an additional fee for overnight delivery of a paper transcript if you need expedited service. Please note, some limitations apply to overnight deliveries


Please choose from one of the following options:
